task.title: Merge TMX Files
task.shortdesc: Follow these steps to merge the content of two or more TMX files into a larger one.

step.cmd: In main menu, select File Merge TMX Files... .
step.stepresult: The following dialog appears: Merge TMX Files Dialog

step.cmd: Enter the name of the file that will contain all merged data in the Merged TMX File text box or click the Browse... button to select a file from the file system.
Use the Add Files button to select the files to be merged from the file system.
If you need to remove files from the list, select them clicking the corresponding checkboxes in the leftmost column and then click the Delete Selected Files button.
Click the Merge TMX Files button.

taskbody.result: A progress dialog is displayed while a TMX file containing data from all selected files is created in the indicated location.
